info.title: Wii Quizz
info.author: CashMan
info.details:
Wii Quizz is a quiz/puzzle homebrew application. You can play a mode game of your choice :

- Race to the million :
In this mode, you have to get one million dollars answering various questions.

- Free mode :
In this mode, your goods and wrongs answers are counted. You must have the most right answers.
